> **Task Number**: 03 | **Dependencies**: None

## Objective

## Notes
The markdown parser should recognize emoji-based checkbox formats:

- [ğŸš§] or [âŒ] means in progress or blocked

With 1 complete and 1 in-progress out of 3 total, this should show IN_PROGRESS status.
